# Standard tables

Paragraph Lorem ipsum

|    |    |    |
| -- | -- | -- |
| a1 | a2 | a3 |
| b1 | b2 |    |
| c1 |    | c2 |

| a1 | a2 | a3 |
| -- | -- | -- |
| b1 | b2 |    |
| c1 |    | c2 |

# Table with guessed header

| a1 | a2 | a3 | a4 |
| -- | -- | -- | -- |
| b1 | b2 |    |    |
| c1 |    | c2 |    |

# Table with protected pipe chars

| a1                | a2                                    |
| ----------------- | ------------------------------------- |
| &#124;            | pipe in code: <code>&#124;</code>     |
| true &#124; false | c2                                    |
| d1                | also <code>pipe &#124; in code</code> |
